patthana8.26:4.1: Noganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.26:4.2: Noganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanogantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.26:4.3: Noganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho ca nanogantho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.26:5.1: Nanoganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanogantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.26:5.2: Nanoganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.26:5.3: Nanoganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho ca nanogantho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.26:6.1: Noganthañca nanoganthañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.26:6.2: Noganthañca nanoganthañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nanogantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.26:6.3: Noganthañca nanoganthañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho ca nanogantho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.26:7.1: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
